languages.text: "С превеликим удовольствием. Наш представитель свяжется с вашим и передаст все необходимые свитки под печать и подпись. Да благословит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} этот новый союз!"

traits.locale_text: "С превеликим удовольствием. Наш представитель свяжется с вашим и передаст все необходимые свитки под печать и подпись. Да благословит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} этот новый союз!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"
languages.original_text: "С превеликим удовольствием. Наш представитель свяжется с вашим и передаст все необходимые свитки под печать и подпись. Да благословит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} этот новый союз!"

traits.locale_text: "With great pleasure. My emissary will contact yours and deliver scrolls that require your signature and the seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new union!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "With great pleasure. My emissary will contact yours and deliver scrolls that require your signature and the seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new union!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “我们非常荣幸。我们的使者将会负责与您的使者联系，并将卷轴交给您签字盖章。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑这个新生的联盟！”
languages.original_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"

traits.locale_text: “我们非常荣幸。我们的使者将会负责与您的使者联系，并将卷轴交给您签字盖章。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑这个新生的联盟！”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Será un placer. Nuestro emisario contactará con el suyo y entregará los pergaminos para que estampe en ellos su firma y sello. ¡Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} bendiga esta nueva alianza!».
languages.original_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"

traits.locale_text: «Será un placer. Nuestro emisario contactará con el suyo y entregará los pergaminos para que estampe en ellos su firma y sello. ¡Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} bendiga esta nueva alianza!».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「喜んで。我々の使者がそちらに連絡し、署名と調印のために巻物をお渡ししよう。この新しい同盟に{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご加護があらんことを！」
languages.original_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"

traits.locale_text: 「喜んで。我々の使者がそちらに連絡し、署名と調印のために巻物をお渡ししよう。この新しい同盟に{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご加護があらんことを！」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Mit größtem Vergnügen. Unser Gesandter wird Kontakt mit Eurem aufnehmen und die Schriftrollen für Eure Signatur und das Siegel überbringen. Möge der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} diese neue Allianz segnen!"
languages.original_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"

traits.locale_text: "Mit größtem Vergnügen. Unser Gesandter wird Kontakt mit Eurem aufnehmen und die Schriftrollen für Eure Signatur und das Siegel überbringen. Möge der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} diese neue Allianz segnen!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Avec grand plaisir. Nos émissaires feront parvenir aux vôtres les parchemins à signer et à marquer de votre sceau. Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} bénisse cette nouvelle alliance ! »
languages.original_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"

traits.locale_text: « Avec grand plaisir. Nos émissaires feront parvenir aux vôtres les parchemins à signer et à marquer de votre sceau. Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} bénisse cette nouvelle alliance ! »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Bizim için büyük bir zevk olur. Konsolosumuz sizinkiyle iletişime geçecek, imzalamanız ve kaşelemeniz gereken tomarları iletecektir. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} bu yeni ittifakı kutsasın!"
languages.original_text: "With great pleasure. Our emissary will contact yours and deliver the scrolls for your signature and seal. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} bless this new alliance!"

traits.locale_text: "Bizim için büyük bir zevk olur. Konsolosumuz sizinkiyle iletişime geçecek, imzalamanız ve kaşelemeniz gereken tomarları iletecektir. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} bu yeni ittifakı kutsasın!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
